content: क्षेपः [क्षिप्-घञ्] {@--1@} Throwing, tossing, casting, moving about, movement (of limbs); कुंदक्षेपानुगम <ls>Me. 47</ls>; भ्रूक्षेपमात्रानुमतप्रवेशां <ls>Ku. 3. 60.</ls> {@--2@} A throw, cast. {@--3@} Sending, dispatching. {@--4@} Depression; striking down. {@--5@} Transgressing. {@--6@} Passing away (time); कालक्षेपः. {@--7@} Delay, dilatoriness. {@--8@} Insult, abuse; क्षेपं करोति चेद्दंड्यः <ls>Y. 2. 204</ls>; किं क्षेपे. {@--9@} Disrespect, contempt. {@--10@} Pride, haughtiness. {@--11@} A nosegay. {@--12@} A stroke (of an oar &c). {@--13@} Laying on (as a paint &c.), besmearing. {@--14@} (in arith.) Addendum.
